define a Data Type in the enterprise or application layer

options.name: Rules in the ruleset versions defined as prerequisites for the prerequsites of this ruleset
Rules in the ruleset versions defined as prerequisites for that ruleset version
Rules in all lower numbered versions of that ruleset

options.name: Specified through the Access Group, Organization, and Division

questions.name: What statement is true about the ruleset list? (Choose One)

options.name: All development should occur in the highest version
Only the highest version of ruleset should be unlocked
Once locked, a ruleset version should not later be unlocked

options.name: Several development teams work on different enhancements in a RuleSet simultaneously that will go into production at the same time
The only development team work on an enhancement in a RuleSet and it is not known ahead when the enhancement will go into production
Several development teams work on different enhancements in the same RuleSet simultaneously and it is not known ahead which enhancements will go into production first

questions.name: Process Commander’s branching ability is most appropriate to use when ________ (Choose One)

options.name: Branches are defined on the application

A branched RuleSet must belong to a branch

options.name: All merge conflicts must be resolved
The branch RuleSets must be locked

options.name: Ignore conflicts in other branched RuleSets since changes might not be final
It is recommended to merge rules into a new (higher) base RuleSet version
Use the automatic merge functionality for minor base rule changes

options.name: Create a new RuleSet version in the target base RuleSet for the branch
Always merge all available branches into the base RuleSet at the same time

Option H: ABC-FW-LoanReq-, LESCatalog:01-01-03, Availability = Yes

Process Commander ensures that the entire ZIP file is imported before the rules in it start executing
Process Commander ensures that an entire RuleSet version is imported before the rules in it start executing

options.name: A data instance does not have to be associated with a RuleSet
The associated RuleSet for data instances of certain classes must be entered manually
Associating a RuleSet to a data instance affects runtime behavior
Associating a RuleSet to a data instance assists in application packaging

questions.name: Which statement regarding the Associated RuleSet setting on data instances is false? (Choose One)
